prefix.label: üî® build
prefix.detail: Related changes (eg: npm / adding external dependencies)

prefix.label: üîº bump
prefix.detail: Update version number to reflect significant changes

prefix.label: üíæ chore
prefix.detail: A code that external user won't see (eg: change to .gitignore or prettierrc file)

prefix.label: üîé ref
prefix.detail: A code that neither fix bug nor adds a feature. (eg: You can use this when there is semantic changes like renaming a variable/function name)

prefix.label: üé® style
prefix.detail: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, etc.)

prefix.label: ü§ñ test
prefix.detail: Adding new test or making changes to existing
